string.context: iOS only alert message telling the user that they received a push notification for a different organization and prompt the user to logout

resources.string: Você recebeu uma notificação de uma organização de saúde diferente. Você gostaria de sair agora e ir para essa organização?

string.context: Appears when patient logs in a different organization that the push notification is for

string.context: Appears when patient logs in a different organization that the push notification is for and prompt to log out

string.context: Appears when a user taps a notification group and the user is already logged in to the organization that the group notification belongs to

string.name: wp_apple_handoff_short_name
string.context: The proper noun for Apple's Handoff technology. This is found at https://developer.apple.com/handoff/. This string is passed into other mychart strings that use this word in the sentence.

string.name: wp_apple_handoff_long_name
string.context: The proper noun for Apple's Handoff technology, prefixed by the name of the company (Apple). The Handoff is found at https://developer.apple.com/handoff/. This string is passed into other mychart strings that use this word in the sentence.

string.name: wp_handoff_wrong_org_title_ios
string.context: Alert message header for the message telling the user that the organization they are attempting to switch to is incorrect for the Apple Watch Handoff task they just activated. %1$@ is Apple Handoff (wp_apple_handoff_long_name)

string.name: wp_handoff_wrong_org_selection_message
string.context: Alert message telling the user that the organization they are attempting to switch to is incorrect for the Apple Watch Handoff task they just activated. %1$@ is the correct organization's name. %2$@ is Handoff (wp_apple_handoff_short_name)

resources.string: A tarefa de %2$@ do Apple Watch é para %1$@. Faça login aqui para continuar.

string.name: wp_handoff_wrong_org_logout_ios
string.context: Alert message telling the user that they received a Handoff task from their Apple Watch for a different organization and prompt the user to logout. %1$@ is Handoff (wp_apple_handoff_short_name)

resources.string: Você recebeu uma tarefa de %1$@ do Apple Watch de uma outra organização de saúde. Você gostaria de sair agora e ir para essa organização?

string.name: wp_handoff_wrong_og_ios
string.context: Alert message telling the user that they received a Handoff task from their Apple Watch for a different organization. %1$@ is Handoff (wp_apple_handoff_short_name)

resources.string: Você recebeu uma tarefa de %1$@ do Apple Watch de uma outra organização de saúde.

string.name: wp_community_link_my_accounts_title
string.context: The title of the link my accounts activity screen

string.name: wp_community_link_my_accounts_account_settings_row_subtitle
string.context: Appears as a subtitle for the Link My Accounts row in the Account Settings activity.

resources.string: Conecte suas contas de outras organizações de saúde para criar uma única visão de suas informações de saúde.

string.name: wp_alert_happy_together_onboarding
string.context: Appears as an alert to introduce H2G feature if the H2G data may be available and the alert has not been read and dismissed before. %1$@ is the MyChart brand name

resources.string: Saiba como %1$@ pode fornecer uma visão única e unificada de suas informações de saúde de organizações onde você e sua família recebem cuidados.

string.name: wp_community_onboarding_title_generic
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together onboarding static page as the title

string.name: wp_community_onboarding_title_connection_update
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together onboarding static page as the title

string.name: wp_community_onboarding_body_text
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together onboarding static page as the body to explain what the E icon means

resources.string: Quando você vir este ícone nos locais a seguir, significa que as informações são de outra organização.

string.name: wp_community_onboarding_go_to_link_my_accounts
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together onboarding static page or as a toast message telling the users where to go to make connection changes later.

resources.string: Para fazer alterações posteriormente, vá a Configurações da Conta e selecione Vincular Minhas Contas.

string.name: wp_community_onboarding_go_to_website
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together onboarding static page telling the user to go to the website to use the account linking feature.

resources.string: Para fazer alterações na conexão, vá ao site e selecione Vincular Minhas Contas.

string.name: wp_community_update_my_account_title
string.context: Title displayed for the update my account MO screen launched by H2G++ activities

string.context: Text indicating that the data was received from a Happy Together organization. %1$@ is the name of the organization

string.context: Title displayed for the notification/toast which show the update is complete for h2g++ organizations. %1$@ is local organization name, %2$@ is the external org name, %3$@ is the patient name, %4$@ is the place holder for Tap to view for notification

resources.string: %1$@ atualizou com sucesso as informações de: %2$@ para %3$@. %4$@

string.name: wp_community_update_complete_with_error_notification_title
string.context: Title displayed for the notification/toast which show the update has error for h2g++ organizations. %1$@ is local organization name, %2$@ is the external org name, %3$@ is the patient name, %4$@ is the place holder for Tap to view for notification

resources.string: %1$@ falhou ao atualizar as informações de: %2$@ para %3$@. %4$@

string.name: wp_community_update_complete_with_success_and_error_notification_title
string.context: Title displayed for the notification/toast which show the update is complete for h2g++ organizations. %1$@ is local organization name, %2$@ is the external org name updated successfully, %3$@ is the external org name failed updating, %4$@ is the patient name, %5$@ is the place holder for Tap to view for notification

string.context: message displayed in the notification when the update is complete.

string.context: Label for the visit indicating that it is regarding an admission to the hospital with multiple procedures

string.name: wp_appointment_visit_default_name
string.context: Placeholder title displayed for appointments without a visit type

string.name: wp_appointment_status_noshow
string.context: Appointment title suffix indicating the status of the appointment was no show

string.context: Appointment title suffix indicating the status of the appointment was canceled

string.name: wp_appointment_status_leftwithoutseen
string.context: Appointment title suffix indicating the status of the appointment was left without being seen

string.context: Title for after visit summary.

string.context: Title for the past visit details activity.

string.context: Header indicating the text below are instructions for the patient related to his/her upcoming surgical case

plurals.name: wp_appointment_surgical_details_title_time_none
plurals.context: Title for the section containing surgical details telling the user that the following surgery is scheduled to be performed on %1$@ date (format: En-US Tuesday, November 23). This will appear in all caps.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_surgical_details_title_time_fuzzy_12Hour_AM
plurals.context: Title for the section containing surgical details telling the user that the following surgery is scheduled to be performed on %1$@ date (format: En-US Tuesday, November 23) in the AM, if they are using 12 hour time. This will appear in all caps.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_surgical_details_title_time_fuzzy_12Hour_PM
plurals.context: Title for the section containing surgical details telling the user that the following surgery is scheduled to be performed on %1$@ date (format: En-US Tuesday, November 23) in the PM, if they are using 12 hour time. This will appear in all caps.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_surgical_details_title_time_fuzzy_24Hour_AM
plurals.context: Title for the section containing surgical details telling the user that the following surgery is scheduled to be performed on %1$@ date (format: En-US Tuesday, November 23) in the AM, if they are using 24 hour time. This will appear in all caps.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_surgical_details_title_time_fuzzy_24Hour_PM
plurals.context: Title for the section containing surgical details telling the user that the following surgery is scheduled to be performed on %1$@ date (format: En-US Tuesday, November 23) in the PM, if they are using 24 hour time. This will appear in all caps.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_surgical_details_title_time_full
plurals.context: Title for the section containing surgical details telling the user that the following surgery is scheduled to be performed on %1$@ date (format: En-US Tuesday, November 23) at %2$@ time. This will appear in all caps.

string.name: wp_appointment_date_time_zone_format
string.context: Format for showing %1$@ time with the corresponding %2$@ time zone abbreviation.

string.name: wp_appointment_date_label_fuzzy_12Hour_AM
string.context: Formatted title for an appointment in the AM if the device is in 12 hour time format, where %1$@ is the appointment date (format: En-US November 23, 1937)

string.name: wp_appointment_date_label_fuzzy_12Hour_PM
string.context: Formatted title for an appointment in the PM if the device is in 12 hour time format, where %1$@ is the appointment date (format: En-US November 23, 1937)

string.name: wp_appointment_date_label_fuzzy_24Hour_AM
string.context: Formatted title for an appointment in the AM if the device is in 24 hour time format, where %1$@ is the appointment date (format: En-US November 23, 1937)

string.name: wp_appointment_date_label_fuzzy_24Hour_PM

string.context: Title for an inpatient-type calendar event (hospital stay or upcoming delivery) for a proxy subject that includes the visit type. %1$@ is the visit type of the stay and %2$@ is the subject's name. ex. 'Hospital Visit for Bobby Smith'

plurals.name: wp_appointment_number_upcoming_procedures
plurals.context: Label informing the patient how many procedures will be performed in the associated admission where %1$@ is the number of procedures

string.context: The voiceover text for an visit cell specific to hospital admissions. %1$@ is the type (upcoming admission /delivery) and %2$@ is the date (long format: En-US November 23, 1937)

string.context: The voiceover text for an visit cell specific to hospital admissions. %1$@ is the type (upcoming admission /delivery), %2$@ is the provider name, and %3$@ is the date (long format: En-US November 23, 1937)

string.name: wp_appointment_accessibility_card_title_barcode
string.context: The accessibility text for a visit cell where the patient has completed e-check in. %1$@ is the custom string for 'eCheck-in'

string.context: Arrive by string for appointments. %1$@ is the arrival time.

string.context: Start by string for appointment. %1$@ is the start time.

string.name: wp_futureappointment_show_join_time
string.context: Join by string for a video visit. %1$@ is the start time of the video visit.

string.name: wp_futureappointment_appointment_time_with_time_zone
string.context: Time string with time zone for appointments. %1$@ is the time. %2$@ is the time zone.

string.context: Time when the patient is expected at a hospital for PM appointments in 12 hour time format.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_cell_expired
string.context: Message displayed for an appointment offer that has expired.

resources.string: Uma oferta para uma nova consulta expirou.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_cell_accepted
string.context: Message displayed for an appointment offer that has been accepted by another user whose name we know. %1$@ is the name of the MyChart user that accepted the appointment, %2$@ is the date of the new appointment and %3$@ is the time of the new appointment.

resources.string: %1$@ aceitou esta oferta de consulta! Sua nova consulta é %2$@ às %3$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_cell_accepted_no_user
string.context: Message displayed for an appointment offer that has been accepted by another unknown user. %1$@ is the date of the new appointment and %2$@ is the time of the new appointment.

resources.string: Esta oferta de consulta foi aceita para você! Sua nova consulta é em %1$@ às %2$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_cell_declined
string.context: Message displayed for an appointment offer that has been declined by another user whose name we know. %1$@ is the name of the MyChart user that declined the appointment.

resources.string: %1$@ recusou uma oferta de consulta para você.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_cell_declined_no_user
string.context: Message displayed for an appointment offer that has been declined by another unknown user.

resources.string: Uma oferta para uma nova consulta foi recusada para você.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_cell_unavailable
string.context: Message displayed for an appointment offer that has been deleted or is otherwise not available.

resources.string: Uma oferta para uma nova consulta não está mais disponível.

string.name: wp_appointment_default_calendar_event_title
string.context: The title for a created calendar event for a given appointment when only the summary is getting copied.

string.name: wp_appointment_default_calendar_visit_type
string.context: Displays as the visit type (in the screen header) when there is no visit type attached to the appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_title_proxy
string.context: Title for an appointment's calendar event that includes the visit type, provider name, and subject's name. %1$@ is the visit type of the appointment. %2$@ is the provider's name for the appointment. %3$@ is the subject's name for whom the appointment is made. ex. MyChart Office Visit with Harriet Sanderson M.D. for Bobby Smith

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_title_proxy_no_provider
string.context: Title for an appointment's calendar event that includes the visit type and subject's name but the provider name is not available. %1$@ is the visit type of the appointment. %2$@ is the subject's name for whom the appointment is made. ex. MyChart Office Visit for Bobby Smith

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_title
string.context: Shows as the event title in a calendar event when creating a calendar event from an appointment. %1$@ is the visit type. %2$@ is the provider name.

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_appointment_time
string.context: Tells the user their scheduled appointment time for the current appointment. %1$@ is the appointment time. The appointment time could be either the time string or an alternate string like AM or PM or TBD

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_arrival_location
string.context: Tells the user arrival location for their current appointment. %1$@ is the arrival location.

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_notes_phone
string.context: Added to the notes of a created calendar event from the selected appointment. Indicates the phone number associated with the appointment. %1$@ is the phone number.

string.name: wp_appointments_calendar_generic_summary
string.context: Added to the notes of a created event for an appointment that is being added to the calendar. Tells the user to check MyChart for appointment details. %1$@ is the MyChart brand name.

resources.string: Verifique o %1$@ para obter os detalhes da consulta.

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_add_success
string.context: This message is displayed to the user to indicate that a visit was successfully added to their calendar.

resources.string: A consulta foi adicionada com sucesso ao seu calendário.

string.name: wp_appointment_details_unavailable_error_title
string.context: Title for alert when user does not have security to view details.

string.name: wp_appointment_details_unavailable_message_org_proxy
string.context: Message for alert when user does not have access to details. %1$@ is the organization name. %2$@ is the patient's name.

resources.string: %1$@ não tem os detalhes disponíveis para a consulta de %2$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_details_unavailable_message_proxy
string.context: Message for alert when user does not have access to details. %1$@ is the patient's name.

resources.string: Esta organização não tem detalhes disponíveis para a consulta de %1$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_details_unavailable_message_org
string.context: Message for alert when user does not have access to details. %1$@ is the organization name.

resources.string: %1$@ não tem os detalhes disponíveis para sua consulta.

string.name: wp_appointment_details_unavailable_message
string.context: Message for alert when user does not have access to details.

resources.string: Esta organização não tem os detalhes disponíveis para a sua consulta.

string.name: wp_appointment_video_too_early
string.context: Message displayed if the user tries to join a video visit before the early start duration. %1$@ is the number of minutes in advance that the visit may be joined.

resources.string: Você não pode entrar nesta consulta por vídeo com mais de %1$@ minutos de antecedência.

string.name: wp_appointment_video_cannot_start_generic
string.context: Error message when something is preventing the user from starting a video visit.

resources.string: Não É Possível Iniciar a Consulta por Vídeo

string.name: wp_appointment_not_allowed_to_join_video_message
string.context: Message displayed to the user when they have the DENY joining video visit security point

resources.string: Você não tem permissão para participar da consulta por vídeo.

string.name: wp_appointment_cannot_join_video_visit_message
string.context: Message displayed to the user when they have a rule preventing them from being able to join a video visit

resources.string: Você não pode entrar na consulta por vídeo neste momento.

string.name: wp_appointment_no_mike_camera_permission
string.context: Message displayed to the user when they have a video visit open but they have prevented MyChart from having access to the camera and the microphone. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: %1$@ não tem permissão para acessar sua câmera e microfone. Para conceder permissão, altere as configurações de Câmera e Microfone em Configurações > %1$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_no_camera_permission
string.context: Message displayed to the user when they have a video visit open but they have prevented MyChart from having access to the camera. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: %1$@ não tem permissão para acessar sua câmera. Para conceder permissão, altere a configuração da Câmera em Configurações > %1$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_no_mike_permission
string.context: Message displayed to the user when they have a video visit open but they have prevented MyChart from having access to the microphone. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: %1$@ não tem permissão para acessar seu microfone. Para conceder permissão, altere a configuração do Microfone em Configurações > %1$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_no_calendar_permission
string.context: The message displayed to the user when we are unable to add an upcoming visit to their calendar because they have not given us access to their calendar on iOS 16 or earlier. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: %1$@ não tem permissão para adicionar as próximas consultas ao seu calendário. Para conceder permissão, altere a configuração do Calendário em Configurações > %1$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_device_no_mike_camera
string.context: Message displayed when the user does not have both a microphone and front camera on their device.

resources.string: Não foi possível encontrar uma câmera frontal ou um microfone no seu dispositivo. Você pode concluir esta consulta no site em vez disso.

string.name: wp_appointment_device_no_camera
string.context: Message displayed when the user does not have a front camera on their device.

resources.string: Não foi possível encontrar uma câmera na frente do seu dispositivo. Você pode concluir esta consulta no site em vez disso.

string.name: wp_appointment_device_no_mike
string.context: Message displayed when the user does not have a microphone on their device.

resources.string: Não foi possível encontrar um microfone no seu dispositivo. Você pode concluir esta consulta no site em vez disso.

string.name: wp_appointment_video_no_internet
string.context: Message displayed when the user does not have internet access when they try to start a video visit.

resources.string: Você precisa de uma conexão com a internet para realizar uma consulta por vídeo.

string.name: wp_appointment_video_conference_full_message
string.context: Message displayed when the user is trying to join a video visit and they have passed the hardware test, but they cannot join because the conference is full.

resources.string: Encontramos uma câmera e um microfone funcionando, e também uma conexão ativa com a internet. No entanto, a consulta por vídeo está cheia. Você não pode entrar neste momento.

string.name: wp_appointment_video_conference_full_title
string.context: Title for the alert when the user cannot join a video visit because the conference is full.

string.name: wp_appointment_video_test_succeeded_title
string.context: Title for the alert that pops up when a user tests the hardware for a video visit and meets all requirements.

string.name: wp_appointment_video_test_succeeded_message
string.context: Message for the alert that pops up when a user tests the hardware for a video visit and meets all requirements.

resources.string: Encontramos uma câmera e um microfone funcionando, bem como uma conexão ativa com a internet. Você pode entrar em consultas por vídeo neste dispositivo.

string.name: wp_appointment_alert_scheduling_failed_title
string.context: Title of the message displayed to the user when the request to accept an appointment offer has failed.

string.name: wp_appointment_alert_scheduling_failed_message
string.context: The message displayed to the user when the request to schedule an appointment offer fails but may be successful if they retry again later.

resources.string: Não foi possível agendar esta consulta no momento. Tente novamente mais tarde.

string.name: wp_appointment_error_confirming_message
string.context: Alert body for a generic error when attempting to confirm an appointment.

resources.string: Sua consulta não pode ser confirmada no momento. Tente novamente mais tarde.

string.context: Title shown when eCheck-In is required to be completed before joining Video Visit

string.name: wp_appointment_go_to_echeckin_alert_action_title
string.context: Popup Button text to shown redirect to eCheck-In. %1$@ is the name for eCheck-in.

string.name: wp_appointment_echeckin_not_now_alert_action_title
string.context: Popup Button text to show echeckin is not done now

string.name: wp_appointment_video_echeckin_required_alert_message
string.context: Popup Message shown when eCheck-in is required to be completed before joining Video Visit. %1$@ is the name for eCheck-in.

resources.string: Você deve completar %1$@ antes de entrar nesta consulta por vídeo.

string.name: wp_appointment_video_echeckin_required_alert_message_website

string.name: wp_appointment_echeckin_composite_number_completed_title
string.context: A string telling the user how many appointments they have completed echeckin for. This happens for appointment panels which are comprised multiple appointments - like child appointments. This is telling the user how many of those child appointments they have completed echeckin for. %1$@ is the echeckin name (i.e. eCheck-in - however this can be customized by customers). %2$@ is the number of appointment the user has completed echeckin for. %3$@ is the total number of child appointments that have echeckin available.

resources.string: Você concluiu %1$@ para %2$@ de %3$@ partes desta consulta.

string.name: wp_appointment_payment_name
string.context: The word for Payments which is the word for how much the patient will need to pay for their upcoming appointment.

string.name: wp_composite_appointment_total_payment_due
string.context: String telling the user how much the total payment is for the appointment. In this scenario, the appointment is a panel meaning it is comprised of multiple child appointments. Each child appointment could have its own payment, so this string is showing what the combined/total payment is for the entire panel. %1$@ is the payment amount in dollars (i.e. $30.50)

string.name: wp_composite_appointment_total_payment_paid
string.context: String tell the user how much of the total payment for the appointment that they have already paid. In this scenario, the appointment is a panel meaning it is comprised of multiple child appointments. Each child appointment could have its own payment, so this string is showing what the combined/total amount they have paid for the entire panel. %1$@ is the amount they have already paid (i.e. $30.50)

string.name: wp_appointment_panel_visit_title_two_component_appointments
string.context: The title displayed for a panel of appointments when the panel appointment itself does not have a display name. Instead, we construct the visit title name using the visit titles of the first two child visits in the panel. %1$@ is the visit title of the first child visit. %2$@ is the visit title of the second child visit.

string.name: wp_appointment_panel_visit_title_more_than_two_component_appointments
string.context: The title displayed for a panel of appointments when the panel appointment itself does not have a display name. Instead, we construct the visit title name using the visit title of the first child visit and then displaying how many other child visits there are. %1$@ is the visit title of the first child visit. %2$@ is the number of the remaining visits in the panel appointment.

resources.string: Esta consulta não pode ser cancelada.

string.name: wp_visit_cancelled_direct_popup_message
string.context: Message displayed to the user to inform them they have successfully canceled a visit.

string.name: wp_visit_cancel_fail_title
string.context: Title of alert sent to user when we are unable to retrieve the details on how to cancel a visit.

string.name: wp_visit_cancel_fail_explanation
string.context: Message displayed to user when we are unable to retrieve the cancel details of a visit and thus cannot cancel the visit. %1$@ is the phone number to call.

resources.string: Sua consulta não pode ser cancelada neste momento. Tente novamente mais tarde ou ligue para %1$@ para cancelar esta consulta.

string.name: wp_visit_cancel_fail_generic
string.context: Alert appears when a visit cancellation fails for an unknown reason

resources.string: Sua consulta não pode ser cancelada neste momento. Tente novamente mais tarde.

string.name: wp_visit_cancel_button_caption
string.context: Caption for button allowing user to cancel an upcoming visit.

string.name: wp_cancelvisit_attempt_failure_message
string.context: Appears when the user attempts to cancel a visit and the request fails.

resources.string: Não foi possível cancelar a consulta.

string.name: wp_cancelappt_commentmaxlengthwarning
string.context: Appears when the user is exceeding the maximum allowed comment length. %1$@ is the maximum number of allowed characters in a comment

resources.string: Os comentários não podem exceder %1$@ caracteres.

string.name: wp_appointment_cancel_request_subject
string.context: Do not translate if your language cannot be represented with the Western European Latin script (windows-1252 code page). Default subject for an appointment cancellation request message. Can be seen in mobile Message Outbox and in Hyperspace inBasket

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_expire_today
string.context: The label informing the user when the appointment offer will expire if it expires today. %1$@ is the time the appointment expires(format: En-Us 8:26 AM).

resources.string: Esta oferta está disponível até hoje às %1$@ ou até que outro paciente a aceite.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_expire_tomorrow
string.context: The label informing the user when the appointment offer will expire if it expires tomorrow. %1$@ is the time the appointment expires(format: En-Us 8:26 AM).

resources.string: Esta oferta está disponível até amanhã às %1$@ ou até que outro paciente a aceite.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_expire
string.context: The label informing the user when the appointment offer will expire. %1$@ is the date (localized day of week, mm/dd/yy) and %2$@ is the time the appointment expires(format: En-Us 8:26 AM).

string.name: wp_appointment_standalone_fast_pass_offer_prompt
string.context: Label text that informs the user that they can accept an offer for an appointment they don't have an appointment for already (waitlist or ticket pass)

resources.string: Você tem uma oferta para sua consulta não agendada.

string.name: wp_appointment_linked_fast_pass_offer_prompt
string.context: Message on top of the waitlist selection in the appointments view. Lets the user know that they have the option to select an earlier appointment time

resources.string: Você pode aceitar um horário anterior para esta consulta.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_next_step_extra_steps_title
string.context: The appointment arrival alert title after user confirms their arrival, but they still have steps to complete

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_next_step_echeckin_message
string.context: The appointment arrival alert message for a sign in with available echeckin. %1$@ is the eCheckin custom name

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_onboarding_announcement
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, alerting the user to the appearance of full-screen onboarding , to introduce the user to the appointment arrival feature.

resources.string: Alerta. A integração apareceu para apresentá-lo ao recurso de chegada de consulta.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_onboarding_activity_title
string.context: Title of onboarding activity for the Appointment Arrival feature, where the user is introduced to the feature and asked if they want to enable it.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_onboarding_activity_explanation
string.context: Text displayed in the onboarding activity for Appointment Arrival feature, explaining what the feature does. %1$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: %1$@ pode usar a localização do seu telefone para informar a equipe da clínica quando você chegar para uma consulta. Basta nos notificar do seu telefone usando nosso recurso Chegada da Consulta e você receberá instruções sobre o que fazer a seguir.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_begin_button
string.context: Title for the button to begin the process of turning on the Appointment Arrival feature.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_enable_button
string.context: Title for the button to turn on the Appointment Arrival feature.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_decline_button
string.context: Title for the button to opt-out of turning on the Appointment Arrival feature.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_decline_reminder
string.context: Reminder that displays to the user, after opting-out, that they can enable Appointment Arrival later via Account Settings. Only displays in a Toast for 3.5 seconds, so translations should be equally succinct.

resources.string: Acesse Configurações da Conta para ativar a Chegada da Consulta.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_accessibility_enable_button_location_missing
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, appended to the Turn On Appointment Arrival button caption, explaining it is not enabled yet because the user has not granted Location permission.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_accessibility_enable_button_bluetooth_missing
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, appended to the Turn On Appointment Arrival button caption, explaining it is not enabled yet because the user has not turned on Bluetooth. Bluetooth is a trademark and should not be translated.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_accessibility_enable_button_location_bluetooth_missing
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, appended to the Turn On Appointment Arrival button caption, explaining it is not enabled yet because the user has not granted Location permission or turned on Bluetooth. Bluetooth is a trademark and should not be translated.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_accessibility_enable_button_location_alarm_missing
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, appended to the Turn On Appointment Arrival button caption, explaining it is not enabled yet because the user has not granted Location or Alarm permission.

resources.string: Ative ativando Localização e Alarmes e Lembretes.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_accessibility_enable_button_alarm_bluetooth_missing
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, appended to the Turn On Appointment Arrival button caption, explaining it is not enabled yet because the user has not granted Alarm permission or turned on Bluetooth. Bluetooth is a trademark and should not be translated.

resources.string: Ative ativando Alarme e Lembretes e Bluetooth.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_accessibility_enable_button_location_bluetooth_alarm_missing
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, appended to the Turn On Appointment Arrival button caption, explaining it is not enabled yet because the user has not granted Location permission, Alarm Permission, nor turned on Bluetooth. Bluetooth is a trademark and should not be translated.

resources.string: Ative ativando Localização, Alarme e Lembretes e Bluetooth.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_accessibility_enable_button_alarm_missing
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, appended to the Turn On Appointment Arrival button caption, explaining it is not enabled yet because the user has not granted Alarm permission.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_disabled_notification_missing_permissions
string.context: Text shown to the user if they had previously enabled Appointment Arrival but later revoked some or all permissions needed, letting them know that the feature has been turned off.

resources.string: A Chegada da Consulta foi desativada devido à falta de permissões

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_service_error
string.context: Notification text shown to the user if something went wrong while trying to start the arrival monitoring service. %1$@ is the name of the app.

resources.string: Faça login na sua conta %1$@ para se preparar para sua próxima consulta.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_title
string.context: Title of permissions activity for the Appointment Arrival feature, where the user will be asked to grant certain permissions before Appointment Arrival can be enabled.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_instructions
string.context: Instructions at the top of the screen where the user will be asked to grant certain permissions before Appointment Arrival can be enabled.

resources.string: Para ativar a Chegada da Consulta, exigimos o seguinte:

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_bluetooth_title
string.context: Name of the Bluetooth feature on the device. This should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages. In addition, the Registered Trademark symbol should be retained.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_bluetooth_title_accessibility
string.context: Name of the Bluetooth feature on the device, used specifically for accessibility so the Registered Trademark symbol is not read by screen readers. This should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_exact_alarm_title
string.context: Title for the card that explains the Exact Alarm permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on Android.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_title_ios
string.context: Title for the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on iOS. This string should exactly match the name of the Location feature/concept that is listed in the Settings app on iOS across all languages.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_title_android
string.context: Title for the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on Android. This string should exactly match the name of the Location feature/concept that is listed in the Settings app on Android across all languages.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_instructions_android_precise
string.context: Label on the card that explains the location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on Android 12+. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission.

resources.string: Verifique que a permissão de localização \"%1$@\" e a localização precisa estão ativadas nas configurações do seu dispositivo.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_instructions_ios_precise
string.context: Label on the card that explains the location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on iOS. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission.

resources.string: Verifique que a permissão de localização \"%1$@\" e a localização precisa estão ativadas nas configurações do seu dispositivo.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_bluetooth_instructions_ios
string.context: Label on the card that explains the Bluetooth permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on iOS. 'Bluetooth' should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages.

resources.string: Verifique se o Bluetooth está ativado nas configurações do seu dispositivo.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_while_using_warning_ios
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user has only enabled 'While Using' location permission for Appointment Arrival on iOS. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the While Using permission.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_warning_android
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user has only enabled 'While Using' location permission for Appointment Arrival on Android. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the While Using permission.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_permission_denied_warning_android
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user has denied location permission for Appointment Arrival on Android.

resources.string: Você não concedeu permissão de localização

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_warning_android_all
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user have not granted all location permissions on Android 12+

resources.string: Você precisa conceder a todas as permissões relacionadas à localização

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_while_using_warning_ios_precise
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user has only enabled 'While Using' location permission for Appointment Arrival on iOS. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the While Using permission.

resources.string: Você concedeu apenas a permissão \"%1$@\" e não concedeu a localização precisa

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_permission_denied_warning_ios
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user has denied location permission for Appointment Arrival on iOS.

resources.string: Você não concedeu permissão de localização

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_precise_location_denied_warning_ios
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user has denied precise location for Appointment Arrival on iOS.

resources.string: Você não concedeu a localização precisa

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_error_android
string.context: Text for an error that appears if the user denies location permissions for Appointment Arrival on Android.

resources.string: Para ativar a Chegada da Consulta, exigimos acesso à sua localização.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_error_android_precise
string.context: Text for an error that appears if the user denies location permissions for Appointment Arrival on Android.

resources.string: Para ativar a Chegada da Consulta, exigimos acesso à sua localização exata.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_turn_on_bluetooth_button_android
string.context: Title for a button to turn on Bluetooth for Appointment Arrival on Android. 'Bluetooth' should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_turn_on_bluetooth_button_android_permissions
string.context: Title for a button to turn on Bluetooth for Appointment Arrival on Android. 'Bluetooth' should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages.

string.context: Text for an error that appears if the user denies Bluetooth permissions for Appointment Arrival on Android.

resources.string: Para ativar a Chegada da Consulta, exigimos permissão de Dispositivos Próximos.

string.context: Title for a button to turn on location for Appointment Arrival on Android.

string.context: Text for a confirmation that appears if the user has enabled precise location for Appointment Arrival on iOS.

string.context: Text for an error that appears if the user has not enabled precise location for Appointment Arrival on Android 12+.

string.context: Text for a confirmation that appears if the user has enabled location for Appointment Arrival on Android.

string.context: Text for a confirmation that appears if the user has enabled always allow location for Appointment Arrival on Android.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_learnmore_button
string.context: Label for the Learn More button in this activity, which a user can tap to learn more about a particular required permission for enabling Appointment Arrival.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_bluetooth_learnmore_p1
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Bluetooth permission requirements for Appointment Arrival. 'Bluetooth' should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages. %1$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: %1$@ usa pequenos dispositivos chamados beacons Bluetooth, localizados nas áreas de check-in de sua organização de saúde. Esses beacons usam Bluetooth para enviar um sinal que seu telefone pode detectar.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_bluetooth_learnmore_p2
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Bluetooth permission requirements for Appointment Arrival.

resources.string: Se você ativar o recurso Chegada da Consulta, seu telefone receberá este sinal e o notificará para fazer o check-in quando estiver perto da área de check-in da sua consulta. O aplicativo receberá esse sinal mesmo quando o aplicativo estiver fechado ou quando o aplicativo não estiver em uso.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_bluetooth_learnmore_p3
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Bluetooth permission requirements for Appointment Arrival. 'Bluetooth' should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages. %1$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: %1$@ não armazena seus dados de Bluetooth e nunca compartilhará dados de Bluetooth com terceiros.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_learnmore_ios_p1_precise
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on iOS. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission. %2$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: O recurso Chegada da Consulta requer \"%1$@\" permissão de localização e sua localização precisa. Essas permissões permitem que %2$@ notifique você para fazer check-in quando você entra em uma área de check-in, mesmo quando o aplicativo está fechado ou quando o aplicativo não está em uso.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_learnmore_android_p1
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on Android. %1$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: O recurso Chegada da Consulta requer acesso ao local. Este acesso permite que %1$@ notifique você para fazer check-in quando você entrar em uma área de check-in, mesmo quando o aplicativo está fechado ou quando o aplicativo não está em uso.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_learnmore_android_p1_always
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on Android when we require always allow permission. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission. %2$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: O recurso Chegada da Consulta requer \"%1$@\" permissão de localização. Esta permissão permite que %2$@ o notifique para fazer check-in quando você entrar em uma área de check-in, mesmo quando o aplicativo está fechado ou quando o aplicativo não está em uso.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_learnmore_android_p1_precise

resources.string: O recurso Chegada da Consulta requer \"%1$@\" permissão de localização e sua localização precisa. Esta permissão permite que %2$@ o notifique para fazer check-in quando você entrar em uma área de check-in, mesmo quando o aplicativo está fechado ou quando o aplicativo não está em uso.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_learnmore_p2
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival. %1$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: %1$@ também pode usar seus dados de localização para sugerir os provedores médicos que estão perto de você. %1$@ não armazena seus dados de localização e nunca compartilhará nenhum dado de localização com terceiros.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_exact_alarm_learnmore_p1
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Exact Alarm permission requirements for Appointment Arrival. %1$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: O recurso Chegada da Consulta requer acesso a Alarmes e Lembretes. Esta permissão permite que %1$@ envie notificações a você em horários específicos.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_exact_alarm_learnmore_p2
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Exact Alarm permission requirements for Appointment Arrival.

resources.string: O recurso Chegada da Consulta usará este acesso para lembrá-lo de fazer o check-in da sua próxima consulta.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_is_user_initiated_arrival_allowed_alert
string.context: Text for springboard alert asking user whether they have arrived for their appt and would like to mark themselves as arrived. %1$@ is the time formatted like 11:30 AM in English.

resources.string: Você chegou para sua consulta às %1$@? Avise a clínica que você está aqui.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_title
string.context: Title of banner asking the user if they have arrived to their appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_title_proxy_subject
string.context: Title of banner asking the user if their proxy subject has arrived to their appointment. %1$@ is the proxy subject's nickname

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_body
string.context: Body of banner asking the user if they have arrived to their appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_body_proxy_subject
string.context: Body of banner asking the user if their proxy subject has arrived to their appointment. %1$@ is the proxy subject's nickname

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_button_proxy_subject
string.context: Button caption user is to tap if their proxy subject has arrived to their appointment. %1$@ is the proxy subject's nickname

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_check_in_error_title
string.context: Title of popup if the check in failed.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_check_in_error
string.context: Body of popup if the check in failed. The user is advised to try again - which is only available in some scenarios - or failing that, go to the clinics front desk to resolve this.

resources.string: Obrigado por nos avisar que você está aqui, mas não foi possível notificar a recepção. Por favor, tente novamente depois ou vá até a recepção para fazer o check-in.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_button
string.context: Button caption user is to tap if they have arrived to their appointment

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_title_checked_in
string.context: Title of banner if user has completely checked in for their appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_nextstep_checkedin_message
string.context: Message displayed if we were able to completely check the user in for their appointment, and no further action is required on their part.

resources.string: Fizemos seu check-in. Aguarde até que seu nome seja chamado.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_nextstep_default_message
string.context: Message displayed if we were not able to completely check the user in for their appointment, and they need to go to the front desk to proceed.

resources.string: Dirija-se à recepção para completar o check-in.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_checkin_announcement
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, alerting the user to the appearance of a full-screen workflow, to allow the user to check in with the appointment arrival feature.

resources.string: Alerta. O check-in da chegada da consulta foi exibido.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_correct_time_dwell_message_long
string.context: The appointment arrival message shown when a user starts the appointment arrival workflow. %1$@ is the display time of the appointment. The display time is in the hh:mm aa format. Ex. 10:35 AM

resources.string: Você chegou para sua consulta às %1$@?

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_correct_time_dwell_message_long_no_time
string.context: The appointment arrival message shown when a user starts the appointment arrival workflow. Used if the appointment date is invalid

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_alert_yes
string.context: The confirmation button for the appointment arrival workflow. This confirms the user is at the appointment and is ready to be check-in

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_correct_time_dwell_message_long_other
string.context: The appointment arrival message shown when a user starts the appointment arrival workflow for a subject. %1$@ is the subject, %2$@ is the appointment display time. The display time is in the hh:mm aa format. Ex. 10:35 AM

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_correct_time_dwell_message_long_other_no_time
string.context: The appointment arrival message shown when a user starts the appointment arrival workflow for a subject. Used if the appointment date is invalid. %1$@ is the subject.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_alert_subject_yes
string.context: The confirmation button for the appointment arrival alert for proxies. This confirms the patient is at the appointment and is ready to be check-in. %1$@ is the subject.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_alert_no
string.context: The decline button for the appointment arrival alert. This will snooze the arrival and ask the use again if they are ready in a few minutes (currently configured to 2 but could change in the future).

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_notification_title

string.name: wp_permissions_location_iOS_always
string.context: The name of the iOS location permission that allows access to location at all times. It should exactly match the name of the associated permission in the Settings app on iOS, across all languages. This string will be inserted into other strings, generally in quotes, to form strings such as 'The Appointment Arrival feature requires 'Always' location permissions.'

string.name: wp_permissions_location_iOS_while_using
string.context: The name of the iOS location permission that allows access to location while the app is in use. It should exactly match the name of the associated permission in the Settings app on iOS, across all languages. This string will be inserted into other strings, generally in quotes, to form strings such as 'This feature requires 'While Using' location permissions.'

string.name: wp_permissions_location_Android_while_using
string.context: The name of the iOS location permission that allows access to location while the app is in use. It should exactly match the name of the associated permission in the Settings app on Android, across all languages. This string will be inserted into other strings, generally in quotes, to form strings such as 'This feature requires 'While Using' location permissions.'

string.name: wp_permissions_location_Android_always
string.context: The name of the Android location permission that allows access to location at all times. It should exactly match the name of the associated permission in the Settings app on Android, across all languages. This string will be inserted into other strings, generally in quotes, to form strings such as 'The Appointment Arrival feature requires 'All the time' location permissions.'

string.name: wp_compose_topiclabel
string.context: Label for a customer service message's topic. Note that mychart differentiates Topic and Subject in messages, where subject is akin to an email subject line, and topic is the general subject matter the inquiry falls within. Topics are always a pre-selected category like Benefits and Eligibility. Subjects are the message heading to the recipient which can be either freetext or predefined category.

string.name: wp_compose_topichint

Note that mychart differentiates Topic and Subject in messages, where subject is akin to an email subject line, and topic is the general subject matter the inquiry falls within. Topics are always a pre-selected category like Benefits and Eligibility. Subjects are the message heading to the recipient which can be either freetext or predefined category.

Topics are always a pre-selected category like Benefits and Eligibility. Subjects are the message heading to the recipient which can be either freetext or predefined category.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_glucose_meal_time
string.context: label for a field that lets the user choose a value for whether a blood glucose reading was taken before or after a meal

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_show_daily_trends
string.context: label for a switch that, when switched on, lets the user view a graph of daily data trends instead of raw data values. Param 1: 7, 30, or 365 days

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_insulin_delivery
string.context: Label for data about insulin (medication for diabetes) delivered/administered to a patient

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_basal
string.context: Label for data about insulin delivery where the insulin was administered to meet basic metabolic needs throughout the day i.e. insulin injected slowly by a pump or larger injections of slow-acting insulin

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_bolus
string.context: Label for data about insulin delivery where the insulin was administered to meet episodic requirements i.e. around the time of a meal

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_basal_hourly
string.context: Hourly collected basal insulin data

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_bolus_hourly
string.context: Hourly collected bolus insulin data

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_basal_daily
string.context: Daily collected basal insulin data

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_bolus_daily
string.context: Daily collected bolus insulin data

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_basal_monthly
string.context: Monthly collected basal insulin data

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_bolus_monthly
string.context: Monthly collected bolus insulin data

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_units
string.context: label indicating that a data type is measured in generic units

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_reading
string.context: This string is deprecated and does not need translation

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_reading_metadata
string.context: This string is deprecated and does not need translation

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_reading_new
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) giving the flowsheet title, the value of the reading and then the value of the date/instant. %1$@ is the flowsheet reading. %2$@ is the value of the cell, %3$@ is the date (long format: En-US November 23, 1937) of the cell and %4$@ is the instant

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_reading_metadata_new
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) giving the flowsheet title, the value of the reading and then the value of the date/instant. %1$@ is the flowsheet reading. %2$@ is the value of the cell, %3$@ is metadata for the reading (e.g. 'after meal' for a blood glucose reading), %4$@ is the date (long format: En-US November 23, 1937) of the cell and %5$@ is the instant

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_contains_abnormal_data
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) after reading either wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_reading_new or wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_reading_metadata_new, informing the user that the reading contains abnormal values (like atypically low blood pressure).

resources.string: Esta linha contém valores anormais. Considere discutir isso com seu provedor médico.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_accessibility_blood_pressure_reading
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) reading aloud a blood pressure. In en-us, this is SystolicValue over DiastolicValue. %1$@ is the systolic value. %2$@ is the diastolic value.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_basal_insulin_delivery
string.context: Data type for basal insulin delivery meaning insulin administered to meet the user’s basic metabolic needs.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_bolus_insulin_delivery

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_glucose_graph_help_text
string.context: Help text about a graph of blood pressure data. 'Show daily trends' is the wp_trackmyhealth_show_daily_trends string. The backslashes and quotes should stay in the translated string

resources.string: Quando \"Mostrar tendências diárias\" está alternado, o gráfico exibe uma barra para cada hora do dia. Levando em consideração todos os dados na semana/mês/ano selecionado, cada barra representa as leituras mínimas e máximas feitas durante aquela hora do dia. Um ponto é mostrado para representar o valor médio (média) durante essa hora.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_display_today
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for the day button on the segmented date control. Informs the user that selecting this button will show readings for the current day.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_display_week
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for the day button on the segmented date control. Informs the user that selecting this button will show readings for the last week.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_display_month
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for the day button on the segmented date control. Informs the user that selecting this button will show readings for the last month.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_display_year
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for the day button on the segmented date control. Informs the user that selecting this button will show readings for the last year.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_display_range
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for the date interval on the segmented date control. Informs the user of the current date range selected. %1$@ is the start date. %2$@ is the end date.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_display_range_today
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for the date interval on the segmented date control. Informs the user the current date range selected is today. %1$@ is the current date.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_row_summary
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for the summary of a cell on the flowsheeet detail page. The cell displays the data for a flowsheet row, %1$@ is the name of the flowsheet row, %2$@ is the value displayed on the row, %3$@ is the unit for the row

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_row_summary_no_reading
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for the summary of a cell on the flowsheet detail page that has no reading. %1$@ is the name of the flowsheet row.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_tap_for_details
string.context: Voiceover hint (read by screen reader) for a flowsheet row that has data. Tapping the row will take the user to a detailed page with all the readings for that row. The string defined here will be prefixed by 'Tap to'

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_add_readings_btn
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for the Add readings button that lets you add new readings to a flowsheet. %1$@ is the name of the flowsheet.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_reading_value
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for labeling the value displayed in a cell when adding/editing flowsheet readings, possibility of %3$@ to be empty if reading has no units. $1$s is the name of the row, %2$@ is the value of the reading. %3$@ is the unit for the row.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_no_reading_value
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) when there is no value displayed in a cell when adding/editing flowsheet readings. $1$s is the name of the row.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_systolic_text
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for the systolic text entry field in the add readings view.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_diastolic_text
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for the diastolic text entry field in the add readings view.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_bp_readings_label
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) for labeling the blood pressure cell when viewing the blood pressure cell. If no reading, $2$s and %3$@ use wp_trackmyhealth_acc_no_reading_value. %1$@ is the row title of the cell. %2$@ is the value of the systolic reading. %3$@ is the value of the diastolic reading.

string.name: wp_health_links_acc_healthapp_sync
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) signifying that the image is just a graphic and shows the link between the device and the user's MyChart. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart. %2$@ is the syncing framework name, i.e. Google Fit or Health Connect.

string.name: wp_health_links_acc_healthapp_is_syncing
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) telling the user that they are currently syncing data from the Health app with MyChart. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart. %2$@ is the syncing framework name, i.e. Google Fit or Health Connect.

string.name: wp_flowsheet_blood_pressure_incomplete
string.context: The alert that appears when one of systolic and diastolic is missing

resources.string: A leitura da pressão arterial está incompleta.

string.name: wp_flowsheet_unexpected_value_alert_title
string.context: Title for the alert indicating that the readings for the flowsheet values are outside the valid range

string.name: wp_flowsheet_abnormal_disclaimer
string.context: The disclaimer that appears to notify the user when values outside the normal range are present

string.name: wp_flowsheet_abnormal_summary_accessibility_text
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) that will be read to the user hovering over a Track-My-Health summary cell after the rest of the accessibility label text is read, conditionally when there are values outside the normal range present in the data set. This will be prefixed by '[flowsheet row name] with latest reading [x]. This will be proceeded by 'Double tap to access history.'

resources.string: Alguns valores estão fora do intervalo normal

string.name: wp_flowsheet_summary_daily_or_trends_accessibility_text
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) that will be read to the user hovering over a Track-My-Health summary cell when displaying a graph showing total daily values or daily trends for a particular flowsheet row. These are notable because no latest reading is displayed in these cases. %1$@ is the name of the flowsheet row, %2$@ is the unit for the row.

string.name: wp_flowsheet_graph_insulin_switch_accessibility_text
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) that will be read to the user hovering over the bolus or basal switch on an insulin delivery graph. %1$@ is the name of the switch. This will be proceeded by 'Switch button - [switch button status]. Double tap to toggle setting.

resources.string: Configuração para mostrar %1$@ unidades no gráfico.

string.name: wp_healthkit_background_app_refresh_disabled_message
string.context: Message for requesting turning on background app refresh for health background syncing. Background App Refresh is a setting in iOS. The Settings > General is the iOS system settings and the General setting under the system settings; they are not the MyChart app settings.

resources.string: Você se conectou a “Saúde”. Ative a Atualização do aplicativo em segundo plano em Ajustes > Geral para sincronizar as leituras quando este aplicativo não estiver aberto.

string.name: wp_healthkit_low_power_mode_enabled_message
string.context: Message for requesting turning off Low Power Mode for health background syncing. Low Power Mode is a setting in iOS. The Settings > Battery is the iOS system settings and the Battery setting under the system settings; they are not the MyChart app settings.

resources.string: Você se conectou a “Saúde”. Desative o Modo de Baixo Consumo em Ajustes > Bateria para sincronizar as leituras quando este aplicativo não estiver aberto.

string.name: wp_flowsheet_status_inactive_message
string.context: Message shown to the user when they attempt to add readings to a flowsheet that is not active.

resources.string: Você não pode adicionar leituras a este registro de saúde.

string.name: wp_flowsheet_cell_start_date
string.context: The text of start date of a flowsheet

string.name: wp_flowsheet_cell_end_date
string.context: The text of end date of a flowsheet

string.name: wp_background_sync_partial_success_message
string.context: Message that appears in a notification notifying the user that some of their health data failed to file. %1$@ is the app display name

resources.string: %1$@ enviou suas leituras para nosso banco de dados, mas algumas não foram atualizadas corretamente. Reabra %1$@ para tentar novamente mais tarde.

string.name: wp_background_sync_failure_message
string.context: Message that appears in a notification notifying the user that their health data failed to file. %1$@ is the app display name

resources.string: %1$@ enviou suas leituras para nosso banco de dados, mas não conseguiu atualizar nenhuma delas. Reabra %1$@ para tentar novamente mais tarde.

string.name: wp_background_sync_invalid_data_message
string.context: Message that appears in a notification notifying the user that their health data failed to file because the data was considered invalid for the flowsheet. %1$@ is the app display name

resources.string: %1$@ enviou suas leituras para nosso banco de dados, mas algumas estavam fora do intervalo válido e não foi possível salvar.

string.name: wp_background_sync_no_network_message
string.context: Message that appears in a notification notifying the user that their health data failed to file due to a missing network connection. %1$@ is the app display name

resources.string: %1$@ tentou enviar suas leituras para nosso banco de dados, mas você não tem conexão com a internet. Reabra %1$@ para tentar novamente mais tarde.

string.name: wp_background_sync_server_error_message
string.context: Message that appears in a notification notifying the user that their health data failed to file due to a server error. %1$@ is the app display name

resources.string: %1$@ tentou enviar suas leituras para nosso banco de dados, mas não conseguiu devido a erros no servidor. Reabra %1$@ para tentar novamente mais tarde.

string.name: wp_background_sync_network_error_message
string.context: Message that appears in a notification notifying the user that their health data failed to file due to network issues. %1$@ is the app display name

resources.string: %1$@ tentou enviar suas leituras para nosso banco de dados, mas não conseguiu devido a problemas de rede. Reabra %1$@ para tentar novamente mais tarde.

string.name: wp_background_sync_upgrade_message
string.context: Message that appears in a notification notifying the user that their health data failed to file because their app needs to be updated. %1$@ is the app display name

resources.string: %1$@ falhou ao enviar suas leituras para nosso banco de dados. Atualize e abra o %1$@ para continuar enviando leituras.

string.name: wp_background_sync_unknown_error_message
string.context: Message that appears in a notification notifying the user that their health data failed to file due to an unknown error. %1$@ is the app display name

resources.string: %1$@ falhou ao enviar suas leituras para nosso banco de dados. Reabra %1$@ para tentar novamente mais tarde.

string.name: wp_background_sync_error_code
string.context: Message specifying the error code in a notification notifying the user that their health data failed to file. %1$@ is the code

string.name: wp_health_links_enabled_row_text_no_readings
string.context: Text shown for a data type row when no readings have been received from the connected health data syncing framework.

string.name: wp_health_links_enabled_row_text_latest_reading_date_time
string.context: Text shown for a data type row displaying the date and time of the most recent reading received from the connected health data syncing framework. %1$@ is the formatted date, e.g. 1/15/2015 12:30 PM

string.name: wp_health_links_last_sync_date_time_text
string.context: Text displaying the date and time of the last sync from the connected health data syncing framework. %1$@ is the formatted date, e.g. 1/15/2015 12:30 PM

string.name: wp_health_links_disconnect_current_account_title
string.context: Title of an alert for disconnecting the current account in Health Links

string.name: wp_health_links_disconnect_current_account_message
string.context: Message of an alert for disconnecting the current account in Health Links. %1$@ is the app name. %2$@ is the name of the health data framework. %3$@ is the patient name. %4$@ is the organization name.

resources.string: Se você optar por desconectar, %1$@ não poderá mais sincronizar dados de %2$@ com %4$@ para %3$@.

string.name: wp_health_links_disconnect_current_account_button

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_footer_text_org_lacks_feature
string.context: Description for the setting that links or unlinks the Apple Watch - informs the user that the organization does not support this feature (likely because their Epic version is too low), but that it will be available soon (when the customer upgrades to May20 or later). %1$@ is the organization's name (eg UW Health)

resources.string: Estamos fazendo melhorias neste aplicativo que estarão disponíveis para %1$@ em breve!

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_footer_text_change_org
string.context: Description for the setting that links or unlinks the Apple Watch when the watch is linked to a different organization.

resources.string: Altere as informações exibidas no seu Apple Watch de %1$@ para %2$@.

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_footer_text_change_user
string.context: Description for the setting that links or unlinks the Apple Watch when the watch is linked to this organization, but to a different user/mychart account.

resources.string: Desconecte o usuário atual deste relógio e vincule sua própria conta.

string.context: Message of the alert shown when a patient attempts to link their Apple Watch when it is already linked to another organization. %1$@ is the name of the linked org, %2$@ is the name of the current org.

resources.string: Seu Apple Watch está atualmente vinculado a %1$@. Você gostaria de criar um link para %2$@ em vez disso?

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_overwrite_linked_user_alert_title

string.context: Message of the alert shown when a patient attempts to link their Apple Watch when it is already linked to another mychart user.

resources.string: Outro usuário está conectado neste momento neste Apple Watch. Você gostaria de fazer login em vez disso?

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_title
string.context: This the title that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_instructions
string.context: This string appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. These are the general instructions to the user that remain constant throughout the linking process. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: Para começar, abre %1$@ no seu Apple Watch e mantenha-o próximo a este dispositivo.​

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_instructions_line_2
string.context: See wp_linkapplewatch_instructions. This appears as a paragraph line under that resource

resources.string: Lembre-se de manter esta tela aberta neste dispositivo até que o processo de vinculação seja concluído.​

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_watch_os_disclaimer
string.context: This string appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with a disclaimer informing them of the minimum watchOS version required for the MyChart for Apple Watch app. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: %1$@ para o Apple Watch requer watchOS 9 ou posterior e um Apple Watch Series 4 ou posterior.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_waiting_for_reachable_watch_app
string.context: This a status message that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. This status indicates that the user must have their watch near their phone and launch the mychart application on the apple watch. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: Abra o %1$@ no seu Apple Watch.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_install_watch_app
string.context: This a status message that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. This status indicates that the user has not yet installed the MyChart app on their watch, and must do so through Apple's 'Watch' app on the iPhone. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: Instale o aplicativo do relógio %1$@ no seu Apple Watch antes de continuar.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_is_linking
string.context: This a status message that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. This status indicates that the phone and watch are currently linking, and once linked, it the watch will show the same health feed the user sees on their phone for the currently logged-in organization.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_successfully_linked
string.context: This a status message that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. This status indicates that the linking process is done. The screen will dismiss itself automatically shortly after showing this message.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_failed_to_link
string.context: This a status message that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. This status indicates that something went wrong during the linking processes. If the user wishes to link, they must close the screen and try again.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_unhandled_error
string.context: This a status message that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. If this message appears, it is because the phone has lost bluetooth connectivity (or never had it) with the watch.

resources.string: Não é possível conectar ao Apple Watch no momento. Tente novamente mais tarde.​

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_troubleshoot_link
string.context: This string appears on a button which when clicked shows troubleshooting tips. The button is on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization

resources.string: Está com problemas para vincular ao seu Apple Watch? Clique aqui para obter dicas de resolução de problemas.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_restart_devices_tip
string.context: This string appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with troubleshooting tips on how to link their MyChart app to their Apple Watch. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: Se você está com dificuldades em vincular %1$@ ao seu Apple Watch, tente reiniciar os dois dispositivos.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_restart_iphone_link
string.context: This string appears on a button linking to Apple's support page for restarting an iPhone. The button is on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with troubleshooting tips.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_restart_watch_link
string.context: This string appears on a button linking to Apple's support page for restarting an Apple Watch. The button is on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with troubleshooting tips.
